verses.verse: <S%G2532>Now<s%> <S%G4845>when<s%> the <S%G2250>day<s%> of <S%G4005>Pentecost<s%> had <S%G4845>come,<s%> <S%G846>they<s%> <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G537>all<s%> with one <S%G3661>accord<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> one <S%G1909>place.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G869>Suddenly<s%> there <S%G1096>came<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G3772>sky<s%> a <S%G2279>sound<s%> <S%G5618>like<s%> the <S%G5342>rushing<s%> of a <S%G972>mighty<s%> <S%G4157>wind,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> it <S%G4137>filled<s%> <S%G3650>all<s%> the <S%G3624>house<s%> <S%G3757>where<s%> they <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G2521>sitting.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> They <S%G4130>were<s%> <S%G537>all<s%> <S%G4130>filled<s%> with <S%G4151>the<s%> <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G756>began<s%> to speak <S%G2980>with<s%> <S%G2087>other<s%> <S%G1100>languages,<s%> <S%G2531>as<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> the ability to <S%G669>speak.<s%>

<S%G1161><s%> <S%G1096>When<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> sound <S%G1096>was<s%> <S%G5456>heard,<s%> the <S%G4128>multitude<s%> came <S%G4905>together,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> were <S%G4797>bewildered,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> <S%G1520><s%> <S%G1538>everyone<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G2980>speaking<s%> in his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G1258>language.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G4074>Peter,<s%> standing <S%G2476>up<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> the <S%G1733>eleven,<s%> lifted <S%G1869>up<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5456>voice,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G669>spoke<s%> out to <S%G846>them,<s%> "You <S%G435>men<s%> of <S%G2532>Judea,<s%> and <S%G537>all<s%> you who <S%G2730>dwell<s%> at <S%G2419>Jerusalem,<s%> let <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G2077>be<s%> <S%G1110>known<s%> <S%G1801>to<s%> <S%G5213>you,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> listen <S%G1801>to<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G4487>words.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> 'It will <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2078>last<s%> <S%G2250>days,<s%> <S%G3004>says<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> that I will pour <S%G1632>out<s%> <S%G575><s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4561>flesh.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G5216>Your<s%> <S%G5207>sons<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2364>daughters<s%> will <S%G4395>prophesy.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G5216>Your<s%> young <S%G3495>men<s%> will <S%G3700>see<s%> <S%G3706>visions.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G5216>Your<s%> old <S%G4245>men<s%> will <S%G1797>dream<s%> <S%G1798>dreams.<s%>

The <S%G2246>sun<s%> will be <S%G3344>turned<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G4655>darkness,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G4582>moon<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G129>blood,<s%> before <S%G4250>the<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2016>glorious<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2064>comes.<s%>
<S%G2532>It<s%> will <S%G2071>be,<s%> <S%G3956>that<s%> <S%G302>whoever<s%> will call <S%G1941>on<s%> the <S%G3686>name<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> will be <S%G4982>saved.<s%>'

<S%G435>"Men<s%> of <S%G2475>Israel,<s%> <S%G191>hear<s%> <S%G5128>these<s%> <S%G3056>words!<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G3480>Nazareth,<s%> a <S%G435>man<s%> <S%G584>approved<s%> <S%G584>by<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> to <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G584>by<s%> mighty <S%G1411>works<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5059>wonders<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4592>signs<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G4160>did<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3319>midst<s%> of <S%G5216>you,<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G2531>as<s%> you <S%G846>yourselves<s%> <S%G1492>know,<s%>

<S%G5126>him,<s%> being <S%G1560>delivered<s%> up by <S%G1012>the<s%> <S%G3724>determined<s%> <S%G1012>counsel<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4268>foreknowledge<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> you have <S%G2983>taken<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> the <S%G5495>hand<s%> of <S%G459>lawless<s%> <S%G4362>men,<s%> crucified and <S%G337>killed;<s%>

<S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> raised <S%G450>up,<s%> having <S%G3089>freed<s%> him from the <S%G5604>agony<s%> of <S%G2288>death,<s%> <S%G2530>because<s%> it <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1415>possible<s%> <S%G2902>that<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> should be <S%G2902>held<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> <S%G846>it.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G1138>David<s%> <S%G3004>says<s%> <S%G1519>concerning<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G4308><s%> 'I saw the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3956>always<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> my <S%G3450>face,<s%> <S%G3754>For<s%> he <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1537>on<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> right <S%G1188>hand,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> I <S%G4531>should<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> be <S%G4531>moved.<s%>

You made <S%G1107>known<s%> to <S%G3427>me<s%> the <S%G3598>ways<s%> of <S%G2222>life.<s%> You will <S%G4137>make<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> <S%G4137>full<s%> of <S%G2167>gladness<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G4383>presence.<s%>'

<S%G3767>Therefore,<s%> <S%G5225>being<s%> a <S%G4396>prophet,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1492>knowing<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> had <S%G3660>sworn<s%> with an <S%G3727>oath<s%> to <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3660>that<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G2590>fruit<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3751>body,<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> he would raise <S%G450>up<s%> the <S%G5547>Christ<s%> to <S%G2523>sit<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2362>throne,<s%>

he foreseeing <S%G4275>this<s%> <S%G2980>spoke<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> the <S%G386>resurrection<s%> of the <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G3756>neither<s%> <S%G2641>was<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5590>soul<s%> <S%G2641>left<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G86>Hades,<s%> <S%G3761>nor<s%> did <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4561>flesh<s%> <S%G1492>see<s%> <S%G1312>decay.<s%>

<S%G5312>Being<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G5312>exalted<s%> by the right <S%G1188>hand<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G5037>and<s%> having <S%G2983>received<s%> <S%G3844>from<s%> the <S%G3962>Father<s%> the <S%G1860>promise<s%> of <S%G4151>the<s%> <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%> he has poured <S%G1632>out<s%> <S%G5124>this,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G5210>you<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G991>see<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G191>hear.<s%>

Now <S%G1161>when<s%> they <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G2660>this,<s%> they were cut to the <S%G2588>heart,<s%> <S%G5037>and<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G3062>rest<s%> of the <S%G652>apostles,<s%> <S%G435><s%> <S%G80>"Brothers,<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> shall we <S%G4160>do?<s%>"

<S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G5346>said<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G3340>"Repent,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> be <S%G907>baptized,<s%> every <S%G1538>one<s%> of <S%G5216>you,<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> the <S%G3686>name<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> the <S%G859>forgiveness<s%> of <S%G266>sins,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> you will <S%G2983>receive<s%> <S%G4151>the<s%> <S%G1431>gift<s%> of <S%G4151>the<s%> <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> the <S%G1860>promise<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> to <S%G5213>you,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5043>to<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G5043>children,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G1519>are<s%> far <S%G3112>off,<s%> even as many <S%G3745%G99999>as<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> will call to <S%G4341>himself.<s%>"

<S%G5037><s%> <S%G2596>Day<s%> by <S%G2250>day,<s%> <S%G4342>continuing<s%> steadfastly with one <S%G3661>accord<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2411>temple,<s%> <S%G5037>and<s%> <S%G2806>breaking<s%> <S%G740>bread<s%> <S%G3624>at<s%> <S%G2596>home,<s%> they took <S%G3335>their<s%> <S%G5160>food<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G20>gladness<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G858>singleness<s%> of <S%G2588>heart,<s%>

<S%G134>praising<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G5485>favor<s%> <S%G4314>with<s%> <S%G3650>all<s%> the <S%G2992>people.<s%> The <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G4369>added<s%> to the <S%G1577>assembly<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> by <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who were <S%G2596>being<s%> <S%G4982>saved.<s%>
